This module implements studios.

Imports

key, nazopuyowrap, permute, simulator, solve, ../core, ../private/assign3, ../private/utils

Types

Studio = object
Studio for Puyo Puyo and Nazo Puyo. 
StudioReplayData = object
Data for the replay simulator.

    tags: [], forbids: [].}
